entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
